content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":108971,"originalJapaneseLine":"モダンは嬉しそうに眺めていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Modan was looking on happily."},{"lineNumber":108972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":108973,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん？　どした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? What's wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":108974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いえ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, nothing...\""},{"lineNumber":108975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当は死んでいる筈の私が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm supposed to be dead, but,"},{"lineNumber":108976,"originalJapaneseLine":"　孫のこんなに近くにいられるなんて、","translatedEnglishLine":"I can be this close to my grandchild,"},{"lineNumber":108977,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだか夢みたいで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it somehow feels like a dream...\""},{"lineNumber":108978,"originalJapaneseLine":"「不謹慎なんですけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's inappropriate, I know,"},{"lineNumber":108979,"originalJapaneseLine":"　胸がいっぱいになって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but my heart is full...\""},{"lineNumber":108980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん、そんなもんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":108981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良かったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's good.\""},{"lineNumber":108982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":108983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おとーさん、はやく行こー行こー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Dad, let's go quickly, hurry up!\""},{"lineNumber":108984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはい、引っ張られんでも行くから落ち着け」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright, no need to pull me, I'll go, calm down.\""},{"lineNumber":108985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、花の冠はいらんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But I don't want a flower crown.\""},{"lineNumber":108986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh...\""},{"lineNumber":108987,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、じゃあ代わりに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, then instead,"},{"lineNumber":108988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お婆ちゃんに作ってくれる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"could you make one for grandma?\""},{"lineNumber":108989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah!\""},{"lineNumber":108990,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはモダン達とのんびり過ごした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance spent a relaxing time with Modan and the others."},{"lineNumber":108991,"originalJapaneseLine":"パステルの部屋で、","translatedEnglishLine":"In Pastel's room,"},{"lineNumber":108992,"originalJapaneseLine":"モダンがカラーの娘達とリセットに囲まれていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Modan was surrounded by Color's daughters and Reset."},{"lineNumber":108993,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでね、小さい頃のパステルったら――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And then, you know, little Pastel—\""},{"lineNumber":108994,"originalJapaneseLine":"数十年前――","translatedEnglishLine":"Several decades ago—"},{"lineNumber":108995,"originalJapaneseLine":"カラーの村――","translatedEnglishLine":"In the village of Color—"},{"lineNumber":108996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おかあさまー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mother!\""},{"lineNumber":108997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、どうしたのパステル？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, what's wrong, Pastel?\""},{"lineNumber":108998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはなのかんむりー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A flower crown,"},{"lineNumber":108999,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おかあさまにあげるの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm going to give it to you, Mother...\""},{"lineNumber":109000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……お母さんに作ってくれたの……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my... you made it for me...?\""},{"lineNumber":109001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe...\""},{"lineNumber":109002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのね、あのね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You know, you know...\""},{"lineNumber":109003,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おかあさま……だいすき」","translatedEnglishLine":"I love you, Mother.\""},{"lineNumber":109004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへへへ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehehehe...\""},{"lineNumber":109005,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てれてれ、てれてれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Blushing, blushing...\""},{"lineNumber":109006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゅーーーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Swoon...\""},{"lineNumber":109007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、パステル。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, Pastel."},{"lineNumber":109008,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お母さん、とーっても嬉しい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Mother is very happy."},{"lineNumber":109009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も大好きよ、ぎゅーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I love you too, big hug.\""},{"lineNumber":109010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ、きゃっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya, kya!\""},{"lineNumber":109011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、こんな感じで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And that's how it was.\""},{"lineNumber":109012,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、今からじゃ考えられないくらい、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, she was such a calm and gentle child that it's hard to imagine now,"},{"lineNumber":109013,"originalJapaneseLine":"　のんびりした穏やかな子だったのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so relaxed and peaceful.\""},{"lineNumber":109014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh...\""},{"lineNumber":109015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こほん……お母様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-ahem... Mother...\""},{"lineNumber":109016,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういった話はそろそろ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it's about time to stop those stories...\""},{"lineNumber":109017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー、まだいいじゃない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh, it's still fine."},{"lineNumber":109018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんなも楽しんでくれているし」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone's enjoying them too.\""},{"lineNumber":109019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、とっても楽しいです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it's really fun.\""},{"lineNumber":109020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もっと聞かせて聞かせて」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tell us more, tell us more.\""},{"lineNumber":109021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、いいわよ〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, alright then~\""},{"lineNumber":109022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":109023,"originalJapaneseLine":"数十年前――","translatedEnglishLine":"Several decades ago—"},{"lineNumber":109024,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おかあさまぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-Mother...\""},{"lineNumber":109025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら〜、パステル、ちっちしちゃった？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, Pastel, did you wet yourself?\""},{"lineNumber":109026,"originalJapaneseLine":"おしっこを漏らしたパステルの表情が","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel's face twisted into a crumpled crying expression after wetting herself."},{"lineNumber":109027,"originalJapaneseLine":"くしゃっと泣き顔に歪む。","translatedEnglishLine":"(This is the continuation of the previous line.)"},{"lineNumber":109028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぇぇえええ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaahhh...\""},{"lineNumber":109029,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、ほらほら大丈夫よ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, there, there, it's alright."},{"lineNumber":109030,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっと早いけどお風呂に入りましょうね〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a bit early, but let's take a bath now.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モダンは嬉しそうに眺めていた。
「本当は死んでいる筈の私が、
孫のこんなに近くにいられるなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can be this close to my grandchild,
it somehow feels like a dream..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸がいっぱいになって……」
「おとーさん、はやく行こー行こー」
「はいはい、引っ張られんでも行くから落ち着け」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright, no need to pull me, I'll go, calm down."
"But I don't want a flower crown."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お婆ちゃんに作ってくれる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could you make one for grandma?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはモダン達とのんびり過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance spent a relaxing time with Modan and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モダンがカラーの娘達とリセットに囲まれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Modan was surrounded by Color's daughters and Reset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでね、小さい頃のパステルったら――」
おかあさまにあげるの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to give it to you, Mother..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……お母さんに作ってくれたの……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my... you made it for me...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お母さん、とーっても嬉しい。
私も大好きよ、ぎゅーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I love you too, big hug."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、今からじゃ考えられないくらい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, she was such a calm and gentle child that it's hard to imagine now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のんびりした穏やかな子だったのよ」
そういった話はそろそろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's about time to stop those stories..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなも楽しんでくれているし」
「あら〜、パステル、ちっちしちゃった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, Pastel, did you wet yourself?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おしっこを漏らしたパステルの表情が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel's face twisted into a crumpled crying expression after wetting herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くしゃっと泣き顔に歪む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This is the continuation of the previous line.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと早いけどお風呂に入りましょうね〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a bit early, but let's take a bath now."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モダンは嬉しそうに眺めていた。
「本当は死んでいる筈の私が、
孫のこんなに近くにいられるなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can be this close to my grandchild,
it somehow feels like a dream..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸がいっぱいになって……」
「おとーさん、はやく行こー行こー」
「はいはい、引っ張られんでも行くから落ち着け」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright, no need to pull me, I'll go, calm down."
"But I don't want a flower crown."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お婆ちゃんに作ってくれる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could you make one for grandma?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはモダン達とのんびり過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance spent a relaxing time with Modan and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モダンがカラーの娘達とリセットに囲まれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Modan was surrounded by Color's daughters and Reset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでね、小さい頃のパステルったら――」
おかあさまにあげるの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to give it to you, Mother..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……お母さんに作ってくれたの……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my... you made it for me...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お母さん、とーっても嬉しい。
私も大好きよ、ぎゅーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I love you too, big hug."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、今からじゃ考えられないくらい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, she was such a calm and gentle child that it's hard to imagine now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のんびりした穏やかな子だったのよ」
そういった話はそろそろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's about time to stop those stories..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなも楽しんでくれているし」
「あら〜、パステル、ちっちしちゃった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, Pastel, did you wet yourself?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おしっこを漏らしたパステルの表情が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel's face twisted into a crumpled crying expression after wetting herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くしゃっと泣き顔に歪む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This is the continuation of the previous line.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと早いけどお風呂に入りましょうね〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a bit early, but let's take a bath now."
